name: ai-stories
description: Generate children stories on cron jobs

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ../backend/src/create-story && npm i && cd ../../../backend/src/generate-audio-for-story && npm i && cd ../../../backend/src/generate-images-for-story && npm i && cd ../../../frontend && touch .env

author: Anchit Sinha
